name: Three Chris's
description: A film about Jesus, Santa Claus and a guy named Chris, all living together.

review.author: christaphor
review.heading: What a fantastic and movie piece of cinema
review.reviewBody:
I saw this at a local viewing online via the world wide web on line. I've got to say that I have never been so moved and touched by such a fantastic and dramatic movie .

Surprised to read some other reviews (i assume they will be deleted soon) as upon watching this movie I have now had to reconsider everything about my life entirely. The three Chris's will go down in history as one of the greats - as soon as this gets discovered. I will be acclaimed a hero among movie reviewers.

Thank you and goodnight !!!!

keywords: virgin mary,reference to satan,santa claus,people with same name,mary magdalene
